comment: paths are os.path.join('root_data_dir_name','dir_name', 'filename'), paths should end on '/'

output.comment: [dir_name, file_name, label], paths are os.path.join('root_data_dir_name','dir_name', 'filename'), paths should end on '/'

input.comment: [dir_name, file_name, label], paths are os.path.join('root_data_dir_name','dir_name', 'filename'), paths should end on '/'
input.comment2: this input is the output of the previous section (link_all_datasets)

upsetplot_output.comment: [dir_name, file_name, title], paths are os.path.join('root_data_dir_name','dir_name', 'filename'), paths should end on '/'
